column1: Criminal Psychology and Criminal Justice MSc/PGDip
column3: Faculty of Arts, Professional and Social Studies
column5: LJMU's Criminal Psychology and Criminal Justice MSc is a new stand-alone qualification designed to enhance your career prospects in criminal justice agencies, the probation service and the police.This course is available to study full-time or part-time.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
